Blog.post: Hey, Im really bored, so im going to write in my "blog" lol... well... i made a link on this page... its pink and it says Laura's Page. thats the link---> urlLink http://www.freewebs.com/divineone/ I made that link and the page! isn't it cool? well i think it is... wow i am tired! kinda crazy, because 2 nights ago i got 13 hourse of sleep and last night i got 8 hourse so i should be ok but.. whatever... my nickname, or atleast for in here is the divine or simply divine.. so thats why this blog is called diary of the divine. ha what a coinky dink...lol.. i told you im bored.. well.. i guess i better go because im really bored and i have to my chored before my dad gets home for lunch! ok? ill write later ! - t h e d i v i n e

Hey, Welcome to my home, my place, my version of Heaven & Hell smashed into one world. Being my first entry i guess i should introduce myself. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- One advantage of talking to yourself is at least you know somebody is listening... ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Name: Laura Age: 14 DOB: November 15, 1989 Status: Happily Taken... I Love You, Adam Belief: There is no God. Religion: Athiest (at the moment) F a v o r i t e s ; Animal: Horse (those who know me, know I am i a horse fanatic) Music: Hip Hop Song: Lil' Flip featuring Lea; Sunshine Scent: Bath and Body Works; Sweet Pea, Tommy Hilfinger; Tommy Girl Poem: Daydream; Whenever I day dream, and day dream I do, in my secret garden, I day dream of you. I day dream of you, in a faraway land; embracing me tight and holding my hand. Holding my hand, and touching my face. Just you and me, in this peaceful place. In this peaceful place a pristine river flows. Where the unicorns run, a breeze always blows. A breeze always blows and sings of a song; our love in a place where you're never gone. Where you're never gone is as it would seem, from dusk until dawn, whenever I day dream. And whenever I day dream, and day dream I do, in my secret garden, I day dream of you. Quotes: "As a well spent day brings happy sleep, so life well used brings happy death." -Leonardo DaVinci "Duct tape is like the force. It has a light side, a dark side, and it holds the universe together." -Oprah Winfrey "A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty." -Sir Winston Churchill "Dream as if you'll live forever...live as if you'll die today." -James Dean "Help control the stupid people population by having your stupid person spayed or neutered" -Joni Mayhan(my mom) Sayings: -Anyone can give up, its the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone else would understand if you fell apart, thats true strength.-A wise person speaks because he has something to say. -A fool speaks because he has to say something. -A closed mouth gathers no foot. -The real art of conversation is not only to say the right thing at the right time, but also to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment. -Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world. -There are three kinds of people in this world: those who make things happen, those who watch things happen, and those who wonder what happened. -Eagles may soar, but weasels don't get sucked into jet engines. -Gravity is an unforgiving motherfucker. -Make it idiot proof, and someone will make a better idiot. -Some people are only alive because it is illegal to kill them. ok, well i think thats enough about me....i'm gonna go... - t h e d i v i n e
